title: BRIEF-Wyndham Worldwide To Sell Its European Vacation Rental Business To Platinum Equity For About $1.3 Bln
text: 43 AM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Wyndham Worldwide To Sell Its European Vacation Rental Business To Platinum Equity For About $1.3 Bln Reuters Staff Feb 15 (Reuters) - Wyndham Worldwide Corp: * WYNDHAM WORLDWIDE ANNOUNCES AGREEMENT TO SELL ITS EUROPEAN VACATION RENTAL BUSINESS TO PLATINUM EQUITY * WYNDHAM WORLDWIDE CORP - DEAL FOR APPROXIMATELY $1.3 BILLION. * WYNDHAM WORLDWIDE - PLANNED SPIN-OFF OF WYNDHAM HOTEL GROUP REMAINS ON TRACK FOR EXPECTED DISTRIBUTION IN Q2 2018 * WYNDHAM WORLDWIDE CORP - ESTIMATES TAX OBLIGATIONS ASSOCIATED WITH SALE OF EUROPEAN RENTAL BRANDS WILL BE LESS THAN 15% OF PROCEEDS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
